DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine phenotypic genotypic characteristic association symptom cluster experience treatment childhood leukemia .
DOC.detailed_description: A repeated measure research design evaluate phenotypic genotypic treatment-related symptom association experience child adolescent 3-17 year age diagnosis leukemia .
DOC.criteria: Phenotypic genotypic treatmentrelated symptom association evaluate child adolescents 318 year age diagnosis leukemia . Children without definite diagnosis leukemia exclude . Children must able understand answer question questionnaire . Children cognitive impairment ( e.g . Down syndrome ) able complete questionnaire eligible study .
